name: R4B-Person-R5-Person
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R4B Person into FHIR R5

element.display: A generic person record

target.display: A generic person record
target.comment: R4B `Person` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Person`

element.display: This person's record is in active use

target.display: This person's record is in active use
target.comment: R4B `Person.active` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Person.active`

element.display: One or more addresses for the person

target.display: One or more addresses for the person
target.comment: R4B `Person.address` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Person.address`

element.display: The date on which the person was born

target.display: The date on which the person was born
target.comment: R4B `Person.birthDate` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Person.birthDate`

element.display: Contained, inline Resources

target.display: Contained, inline Resources
target.comment: R4B `Person.contained` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Person.contained`

element.display: Additional content defined by implementations

target.display: Additional content defined by implementations
target.comment: R4B `Person.extension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `Person.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R4B `extension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `extension`

element.display: male | female | other | unknown

target.display: male | female | other | unknown
target.comment: R4B `Person.gender` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Person.gender` - gender has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/administrative-gender|4.3.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/administrative-gender|5.0.0 (Equivalent)

element.display: Logical id of this artifact

target.display: Logical id of this artifact
target.comment: R4B `Person.id` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Person.id`

element.display: A human identifier for this person

target.display: A human identifier for this person
target.comment: R4B `Person.identifier` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Person.identifier`

element.display: A set of rules under which this content was created

target.display: A set of rules under which this content was created
target.comment: R4B `Person.implicitRules` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Person.implicitRules`

element.display: Language of the resource content

target.display: Language of the resource content
target.comment: R4B `Person.language` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `Person.language` - language made the binding required (from Preferred) for http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/all-languages|5.0.0

element.display: Link to a resource that concerns the same actual person

target.display: Link to a resource that concerns the same actual person
target.comment: R4B `Person.link` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Person.link`

element.display: level1 | level2 | level3 | level4

target.display: level1 | level2 | level3 | level4
target.comment: R4B `Person.link.assurance` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Person.link.assurance` - assurance has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/identity-assuranceLevel|4.3.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/identity-assuranceLevel|5.0.0 (Equivalent)

element.display: Additional content defined by implementations

target.display: Additional content defined by implementations
target.comment: R4B `Person.link.extension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `Person.link.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R4B `extension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `extension`

element.display: Unique id for inter-element referencing

target.display: Unique id for inter-element referencing
target.comment: R4B `Person.link.id` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Person.link.id`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R4B `Person.link.modifierExtension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `Person.link.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R4B `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `modifierExtension`

element.display: The resource to which this actual person is associated

target.display: The resource to which this actual person is associated
target.comment: R4B `Person.link.target` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Person.link.target`

element.display: The organization that is the custodian of the person record

target.display: The organization that is the custodian of the person record
target.comment: R4B `Person.managingOrganization` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Person.managingOrganization`

element.display: Metadata about the resource

target.display: Metadata about the resource
target.comment: R4B `Person.meta` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Person.meta`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored
target.comment: R4B `Person.modifierExtension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `Person.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R4B `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `modifierExtension`

element.display: A name associated with the person

target.display: A name associated with the person
target.comment: R4B `Person.name` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Person.name`

element.display: Image of the person

target.display: Image of the person
target.comment: R4B `Person.photo` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `Person.photo` - photo changed from scalar to array (max cardinality from 1 to *); photo has change due to type change: R4B `photo` `Attachment` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `photo`

element.display: A contact detail for the person

target.display: A contact detail for the person
target.comment: R4B `Person.telecom` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Person.telecom`

element.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation

target.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation
target.comment: R4B `Person.text` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Person.text`
